mapper.insert: insert into IQ_METADATA_COLUMN (PK_ID, MD_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, NOTE, COL_TYPE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IQ_METADATA_COLUMN set MD_ID = #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_TYPE = #{colType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MD_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, NOTE, COL_TYPE from IQ_METADATA_COLUMN
